issue.title: [C++][CI] Valgrind failure in strptime kernel tests
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16185](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16185). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See https://dev.azure.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/_build/results?buildId=23077&view=logs&j=0da5d1d9-276d-5173-c4c4-9d4d4ed14fdb&t=d9b15392-e4ce-5e4c-0c8c-b69645229181&l=7251

It looks like the strptime implementation could leak unrelated data present in the allocated output space.
